sourcesContent:
Edit Person

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Person } from '../../models/person.model'; import { PeopleService } from '../../services/people.service'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-person', templateUrl: './edit-person.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-person.component.css'] }) export class EditPersonComponent { personDetails: Person = { id: '', name: '', country: '', city: '', languageSkills: '', dateOfBirth: new Date(2023, 1, 1), resumeFileName: '', languages: [], cityId: 0, countryId: 0, resumeFile: new File([], '') }; selectedFile: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private route: ActivatedRoute, private personService: PeopleService, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.route.paramMap.subscribe({ next: (params) => { const id = params.get('id'); if (id) { // call api using service this.personService.getPerson(id).subscribe({ next: (response) => { this.personDetails = response; } }); } } }) } //updatePerson() { // this.personService.updatePerson(this.personDetails.id, this.personDetails) // .subscribe({ // next: (response) => { // this.router.navigate(['people']); // } // }); //} updatePerson() { let formData = new FormData(); formData.append("updatePersonRequest", JSON.stringify(this.personDetails)); formData.append("resume", this.selectedFile, this.selectedFile.name); this.http.put('https://localhost:7043/api/People/${this.personDetails.id}', formData) .subscribe(res => { console.log(res); }); } //deletePerson(id: string) { // this.personService.deletePerson(id) // .subscribe({ // next: (response) => { // this.router.navigate(['people']); // } // }); //} deletePerson(id: number) { this.http.delete('https://localhost:7043/api/People/${id}') .subscribe(res => { console.log(res); }); } onFileSelected(event: any) { this.selectedFile = event.target.files[0]; } }
